★【Best Cost-effective Dash Cam】Exceptional night vision for clear footage day and night. WDR function, can adjusts brightness to reduce strong light and improve visibility in low-light conditions, ensuring clear capture of nighttime road conditions. 170° wide-angle front camera and a 150° wide-angle waterproof rear camera, captures everything without any blind spots.

✅ 【G-sensor Auto Accident Lock】Dashcam with highly-sensitive G-sensor, during a collision, the dash cam will lock the current video to save it as evidence. This video won't be deleted in loop recording mode. It will automatically overwrites the oldest unlocked video when the memory card is full, freeing up space for the latest recordings and emergency videos.

🎁【64GB TF Card &Two Mounting Ways】Lnkful dash cam for cars comes with a free 64GB card, meet your storage needs for a long time driving. Car dash cam comes with two mounting brackets for easy windshield attachment. The operation is simple and user-friendly, perfect for new users. (Please format the sd-card before recording)

✅ 【Commitment to Providing 24/7 Online Support for Dashcam】As our valued customer, will always receive prompt and efficient assistance. With our dedicated technical support team, we aim to create a seamless and enjoyable purchasing experience for you.This dash camera is very easy to install and operate with reference pictures in our user manual.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Lnkful Cutting-Edge Dash Cam Front And Rear Dual 1080p —— the ultimate companion for your driving journeys A6pro Dash cam sleek and feature-packed device is equipped with state-of-the-art front and rear cameras, each boasting a crystal-clear 1080p resolution. With its exceptional video quality, you can capture every detail, including license plates and road signs, ensuring a reliable record of your commute or road trip.Our dash cam factory produces sleek, technologically advanced devices. Technology: We use cutting-edge tech to manufacture state-of-the-art dash cams. Our devices have advanced sensors and lenses that capture clear footage in different lighting conditions. They also have wide-angle lenses, night vision, and image stabilization for optimal video quality. Appearance: Our factory produces high-quality car dash cams with sleek designs that seamlessly blend into any vehicle's interior. We offer various styles and configure to meeting different needs Focus on safety: We're committed to enhancing the driving experience and ensuring road safety through innovative features. Designed for convenience and safety, this dash cam for cars comes loaded with a range of advanced features.

The lens of Lnkful dash cam is constructed from high-quality materials, offering durability and clarity. It provides exceptional footage with minimal distortion, reduces glare, and offers a wide-angle view with image stabilization for smooth recording, ensuring that you capture every moment on the road accurately. Material: The lens of our car dash cam is crafted from high-quality materials to ensure durability and clarity. It is made of precision-engineered glass that provides excellent optical properties, effectively minimizing distortion and maximizing light transmission. Effects: With our dash cam lens, you can capture stunning footage in various lighting conditions. It offers exceptional clarity, allowing for the crisp and detailed recording of your journeys. The lens is designed to reduce glare and reflections, ensuring a clear view of the road ahead. Functionality: Our dash cam lens features a wide-angle design, providing a broader field of view to capture more of the surrounding environment. Additionally, the lens incorporates advanced image stabilization technology, resulting in smooth and stable video footage even on bumpy roads.

Exceptional night vision for clear footage day and night. WDR function, can adjusts brightness to reduce strong light and improve visibility in low-light conditions, ensuring clear capture of nighttime road conditions. Built-in G-sensor detects sudden shocks or impacts, automatically saving and locking the recorded footage as evidence in the event of an accident. Loop recording feature ensures uninterrupted recording by overwriting the oldest footage with the newest, ensure that storage space is always available

Parking monitoring feature provides continuous surveillance even when your vehicle is parked, giving you peace of mind. When in reverse gear, the car's display switches to the rearview camera automatically. The wide-angle view helps beginners reverse into the garage easily. We have prepared 64GB SD Card which has insertedinto the dash cam. No need to buy SD card separately.

Along with the dash cam, you will receive 1* 64GB storage card, providing ample space for your recordings.2* dashcam mounts are included, choose according to your habits or keep it as a spare.1* car charger, 1*usb, and necessary installation tools in the package. 3 Inch Dash Cam-- Easy Installation They are 360° rotatable holder This is a compact, sleek, and high-performance dash camera with a 3-inch display, designed to not obstruct your vision while driving. Additionally, this dash cam for cars can be effortlessly mounted to your vehicle's windshield using the included 2 holder (Suction Cup and Paste Bracket) . Simply plug it in, and you're ready to go. A comprehensive one-year service and excellent after-sales service, giving you the support you need. If you need to link the truck we will send you a cable extension separately. You can send your address to us after purchasing the product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars The night vision is a particularly impressive feature
reviews.reviewText: This Dash Cam (with Front and Rear Dual 1080P) is a reliable and high-performance device for capturing every detail on the road, plus it adds a layer of security and peace of mind for yourself or loved ones who are on the road away from you. With dual 1080P cameras, it provides clear and crisp footage both in front of and behind your vehicle, ensuring comprehensive coverage for any accidents. The generous 64GB storage capacity allows for ample recording time, making it a top-notch choice for drivers prioritizing safety and documentation. I definitely feel safer driving with this running and recording.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice dash camera!
reviews.reviewText: I got this camera for my daughter to use during her commutes to and from work daily. She is a nurse and has a daily commute of over an hour each way to work daily and has to drive through congested areas on her trip. I think that it is always a great idea to have a dash camera in your vehicle for all trips as video proof during any accident or to have as video proof of other accidents that you may witness. This camera was a great choice due to the 1080P video clarity and it even came with a rear camera which van be recorded, unlike the backup camera on your vehicle. It locks in the video in a crash so that you will have it if you need it which is a great feature and the camera was easy to install and use. We have been very satisfied with this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Instructions as a little unclear, best you have some experience
reviews.reviewText: First of all I have to say that the screen on this camera is so small I searched through the box a couple of times before I realized that the camera back panel IS the screen. Definitely need to keep the reading glasses around for any in-vehicle reviews of the recordings.The second camera is tiny - smaller than a marshmallow, as it is simply a secondary with no capabilities other than sending the signal to the main camera. It looks like all the brackets you need for installation are included, along with both the SD card and the reader. There are several cables provided - one is a charging cable USB-C to your vehicles' cigarette lighter or similarly-shaped power outlet, USB to USB-C data transfer cable and the connection cable for the rear camera - that is where the limitations beyond the tiny screen come in.The item page reads that you can use these cameras in a car or truck, but that means the back window of the TRUCK CAB, not the back window of any topper you may have on your truck bed - there is not enough cabling for that. It doesn't seem to me to be enough cabling to reach the rear window of an average-sized SUV, either.The instruction booklet is pretty thorough once you get past the poor translations and I feel confident that I won't have too much trouble hooking it up. Now, successfully hiding the cable stretching from dash camera to rear window camera... probably not so much. I got this hoping I could find a way to install the rear camera in the back window of my RV trailer for added security but I would need many more feet of cable and a disconnectable junction at the rear tailgate for when I am NOT towing the trailer.If I can find the right cable as an extender I will update this review, but no news means I have only installed the front camera.This dash cam front and rear are rated 4.7/5 by the new users (this particular model was released Oct. 23, 2023), however I was unable to find anything about longer cables or modifications to that end. So far :)All in all without having been able to test it so far I can recommend it with a grain of salt - there seems to be a lot of attention paid to all the little parts you need to be able to install this yourself, the rear cam looks easy, just with a lot of cable-tucking.Recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Gets the Job Done, with Some Quirks
reviews.reviewText: I embarked on using a camera of this kind for the first time, making it a novel experience for me. Unboxing the product revealed a rather unexpected surprise – the viewing screen used to power the camera on/off and complete the setup is exceptionally small. For someone of my age, it's excessively tiny. Nonetheless, I resorted to using a magnifying glass (yes, I truly did) to navigate through the setup. It wasn't overly complicated and generally intuitive.The front-facing camera affixed to my windshield with a suction cup, which was straightforward. However, the rear camera presented a different dilemma. It's designed to be screwed into the carpeted board under the rear window, which poses an issue for a pickup truck like mine. Regrettably, the kit only included a suction device for the front camera, leaving the rear camera's mounting unresolved. I'm still exploring mounting options, and I'll update this review if I find a solution.The cord for the rear-facing camera is sufficiently long to stretch from the rear window to the front camera, but not long enough to be discreetly hidden. Similarly, the cord for the front camera is quite lengthy, resulting in most of it being coiled and tucked into a cubby near the plug.The camera comes with a micro-SD card pre-installed. "Micro" is indeed the operative word here, as my fingers are almost too large to handle it. Additionally, it includes a USB stick into which the SD card inserts, allowing you to download videos onto your computer – a handy feature for accident evidence.I deliberated between giving this product 3 or 4 stars. What nudged it lower on the rating scale is the minuscule screen size (making it difficult to read) and the issue of mounting the rear-facing camera in a pickup truck scenario. Nevertheless, I believe this serves as a decent entry-level camera. If you're seeking something that integrates better with your vehicle (concealed cords) and has a more legible screen, you might want to explore other brands.Pros:• Easy setup.• Easy installation (except for pickup trucks).• Micro SD card for video storage.Cons:• Extremely small screen size.• Limited options for mounting the rear-facing camera.My Take: I would recommend this with reservations.As a Vine reviewer, I'm mindful of the influence my reviews can have on fellow consumers. Just like you, I rely on reviews when making my own purchasing decisions. Therefore, I'm committed to providing valuable insights to those considering the products I review. Additionally, considering that I'm obliged to pay taxes on the retail value of the products I receive (approximately 40%, with 15.3% in Social Security/Medicare taxes and 25% in Federal Income taxes), I prioritize delivering honest reviews for every item I receive.For reference, here's how I rate products:- 1 Star: Do not buy. This item has serious flaws.- 2 Stars: Do not buy. Not as bad as a 1 Star, but it still has major downsides.- 3 Stars: Buy if you can't find an alternative. There are some issues that need to be worked out.- 4 Stars: Recommend purchase. This item met my expectations.- 5 Stars: I love this product.
